pages.text: Skip to main content Authentic Hibachi in Charleston Craving flavorful Japanese hibachi in West Ashley? Our family-owned Hibachi Hut serves up dishes like Hibachi Chicken and Vegetable Spring Rolls for lunch and dinner. Customers love our generous portions, fresh ingredients, and friendly service. Enjoy dine-in or takeout from our vibrant menu today! Order Online View Menu About Hibachi Hut Welcome to Hibachi Hut, located at 2408 Ashley River Rd Unit Y, Charleston, SC 29414, in Pier Pont Crossing at Ashley River Road and Dogwood Road. We’re proud to serve neighborhoods like West Ashley with authentic Japanese favorites like Teriyaki Chicken, Crispy Calamari, and Seaweed Salad, all crafted with care. Diners praise our quick service, amazing quality, and warm atmosphere. Join us for a delicious meal with dine-in or takeout!
